replies.body:
Regardless of intent, disconnecting negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a key reason why penalties cannot be modified and why all disconnections are treated equally.

Disconnections can be caused by a number of factors, however, the most common by far is if you have incompatible network settings that prevent a good link from being established with the servers. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if that guide resolved your issues.
